whatIs.title: What is Draconic Translator
whatIs.description: Draconic Translator is an online tool that converts English into various Draconic dialects. Ideal for fantasy role-players, it supports text, speech, and image translations, ensuring seamless integration with your gaming needs.

examples.title: Translation Examples
examples.description: Explore practical examples of the draconic translator in action, showcasing its ability to accurately convert complex texts. This section highlights the versatility of the tool, demonstrating its potential for both casual users and professional translators.

howto.title: How to Translate English to Draconic
howto.description: Follow these steps to effortlessly translate texts.

steps.name: Upload a File
steps.description: Begin by uploading your text file to the Draconic Translator. Ensure the file is in a readable format like .txt or .doc.

steps.name: Select Translation Mode
steps.description: Choose the appropriate mode for your translation: technical, literary, or general, to suit your content needs.

steps.name: Preview and Adjust
steps.description: Preview your translated text and make any necessary adjustments. Utilize grammar checks and tense suggestions for accuracy.

steps.name: Download Results
steps.description: Once satisfied, download your translated document in the desired format, ensuring it’s ready for your next campaign or project.

items.title: Ancient Language Origins
items.description: Draconic is considered one of the oldest languages, with dragons believing other languages are its derivatives. [Learn more](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Draconic_language)

items.title: Draconic and Abyssal Scripts
items.description: In D&D 4e, Abyssal was written using the Iokharic alphabet, the same as Draconic, creating amusing fan theories. [Explore further](https://dnd.wizards.com/)

items.title: Custom Dictionary Imports
items.description: VibeTrans elevates your experience with Custom Dictionary Imports. Tailor your translations by uploading bespoke word lists, ensuring your content vibes with your audience. Whether you’re dealing with industry jargon or quirky slang, seamlessly integrate them to keep your communication top-notch and relevant.

items.title: Immersive Mode Feature
items.description: Unleash the power of VibeTrans with the Immersive Mode. Dive headfirst into the language and culture, getting the lowdown like a local. This feature offers real-world scenarios and slang, making your translations as fresh as a daisy and on point.

items.title: Batch Document Translation
items.description: Tired of translating documents one by one? VibeTrans turns the grind into a breeze with Batch Document Translation. Seamlessly translate multiple files at once, ensuring consistency and saving time. Perfect for busy bees needing swift, reliable translations without breaking a sweat.

items.title: Diverse Dialect Support
items.description: VibeTrans takes dialect diversity seriously, embracing every twist and turn of language quirks. Whether it's Southern drawls or Cockney rhymes, we've got your back. Our translator turns linguistic chaos into seamless clarity, ensuring no phrase gets lost in translation. Dive into dialects without breaking a sweat!

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Have other questions? Feel free to contact us via email.

item-1.question: What is Draconic Translator?
item-1.answer: Draconic Translator is a web-based tool that translates English into multiple fantasy Draconic dialects, ideal for role-playing games and language enthusiasts.

item-2.question: Is this translator free?
item-2.answer: Draconic Translator offers a free basic version with limited features. For advanced functionalities and unlimited translations, a subscription is required. Experience quality translations without a cost, and upgrade anytime to unlock premium features and enhance your translating experience.

item-3.question: How is my privacy protected?
item-3.answer: Your privacy is our top priority. We use end-to-end encryption to secure your data. Additionally, we never store any of your translations on our servers. Regular security audits are conducted to ensure your information remains safe.

item-4.question: Which is the best Draconic translator?
item-4.answer: The best Draconic translator is one that provides accurate translations while being user-friendly and efficient. Look for features like real-time updates, a comprehensive dictionary, and positive user reviews. Prioritize platforms that offer additional learning resources for a better experience.

item-5.question: Can I use this offline?
item-5.answer: Yes, the draconic translator is available offline. To use it, first download the language pack from the settings menu. Once downloaded, activate offline mode by toggling the switch in the app. Enjoy seamless translations without an internet connection.
